root.name: Shinobi III : Return of the Ninja Master
root.description: OverviewAfter the adventures in Revenge of Shinobi, it seemed like Joe Musashi, finally destroyed the evil criminal empire Neo Zeed. However, Neo Zeed decided to remain low until years later. Now the empire is once again on the rise, and it's up to the powerful Shinobi to finally destroy Neo Zeed for good.Â

similar_games.game: Ninja Gaiden II: The Dark Sword of Chaos
